text: The 2016 Red Bull Air Race of Lausitz was the sixth round of the 2016 Red Bull Air Race World Championship season, the eleventh season of the Red Bull Air Race World Championship. The event was held at the EuroSpeedway Lausitz in the Brandenburg state of Germany. This was the last event before the death of the 2008 champion Hannes Arch. ==Master Class== ===Qualification=== {|class="wikitable" style="font-size: 95%;" |- ! ! ! Pilot !
